definitions.text: something that happens at a given place and time

examples: in that event, the first possibility is excluded
it may rain in which case the picnic will be canceled

definitions.text: a phenomenon located at a single point in space-time; the fundamental observational entity in relativity theory
a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon
examples: the magnetic effect was greater when the rod was lengthwise
his decision had depressing consequences for business
he acted very wise after the event
